description: This file defines an abstract repository interface and its two implementations for managing 'Note' entities in a note-organizer application. It provides methods for CRUD operations and supports both a SQLite-backed repository using sqflite and an in-memory repository for testing or development purposes.

classes.name: INoteRepository
classes.description: An abstract interface defining CRUD operations for Note entities, to be implemented with different data sources.

classes.name: SqfliteNoteRepository
classes.description: A concrete implementation of INoteRepository that uses the sqflite package for persistence in a SQLite database.

classes.name: MemoryNoteRepository
classes.description: An in-memory implementation of INoteRepository primarily useful for testing and development without persistent storage.

methods.name: getAllNotes
methods.description: Fetches all notes, typically sorted by most recent update.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its id, returns null if not found.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note and returns it with the generated id.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note and returns the updated note.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its id.
